籤詩版本二:
Mipaini nemipaini yakasvibirira iri kukura, uye mvura, sinou, mhepo, uye chando ndizvo zvinhu zvose zvokuita.
Ramangwana richangoerekana rava kushandiswa kukuru, uye mukurumbira uchava mbiru.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram mufananidzo wesango rakaoma remapaini nemisipiresi.
Pane hukuru mune zvese.
解曰: Rombo rakanaka munzira. Basa rakanaka roupenyu hwose. Makonye emumunda aibva. Mhuri yakabudirira.
籤詩故事一:
◇Fan Wenzheng akafunga kubhohwa nekudhirowa porridge
Fan Zhongyan, mukuru ane mukurumbira muHumambo hweNziyo, akabva kumhuri yevarombo paakanga achiri mudiki.Aidzidzira mumusha wemamongi muChangbai Mountain.Aibika porridge nemarita maviri emapfunde zuva rega rega.Mushure mekuoma kwehusiku,akaicheka. Akadya nhindi mbiri mangwanani namadekwana, uye akacheka magaka maviri kuti adye.
Izvi zvinoshandiswa kutsanangura munhu asingatyi kuomerwa, kudzidza nesimba, uye pakupedzisira anova tarenda rekushandisa kukuru.
Cheka haro wodhirowa porridge
聖意: Jiazhai anozvigadzirira, kutsvaga hupfumi, rugare, bhizinesi, muchato, kubudirira, Liujia, varume vanofamba netsoka, minda yekuvimba, silkworm, zvipfuwo zvitanhatu, kukuvadza, kutsvaga vanhu, mhosva, kutama, pfuma yakarasika, kurwara, guva reAnshan, runako.
古人: Fan Wenzheng afunga kuhakura nekudhirowa porridge
